jd: Hello Folks, (Prefer local to TX & GA state & Must have strong exp with Scrum Master, Java, Microservices, Kubernetes Security, Python, Cloud skills) - Note itHope you all are doing good.Please go through the Job description and let me know your interest. Title: Technical Scrum Master with Java, Microservices, Kubernetes & cloud expWork Location: Atlanta, GA/ Frisco, TX (Day 1 Onsite) Duration: Long Term ContractNote: We are looking for Scrum Master who managed Java application related ProjectsMust Have Skills –Scrum Master: 10+ YearsJava : 8+ YearsJira: 8+ YearsKubernetes Security: 5+ YearsGolang/Python: 3+ YearsCloud: 5+ YearsSoftware Development: 3+ YearsExperience: Candidate who worked as SM for engagements which involves – • Building applications in Java microservices, APIs• Used Cloud services extensively, preferably in AWS• TPO should have a good understanding of Microservices, Data models, REST/SOAP APIs, Swagger, Postman, Kubernetes• Experience in Jira, Jira Align, Confluence, GitHub toolsAs Scrum Master:Lead and facilitate Scrum ceremonies including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, retrospectives, and sprint reviews. Ensure that Agile principles and practices are followed.Identify and resolve obstacles that may hinder the team’s progress. Work to remove any blockers and ensure smooth workflow.Help the team maintain focus on sprint goals. Track sprint progress, manage sprint backlogs, and ensure timely delivery of sprint deliverables.Foster a culture of continuous improvement by encouraging feedback, promoting best practices, and facilitating process enhancements.
